# tf.keras.backend.elu

``` python
tf.keras.backend.elu(
    x,
    alpha=1.0
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py).

Exponential linear unit.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`x`</b>: A tensor or variable to compute the activation function for.
* <b>`alpha`</b>: A scalar, slope of negative section.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
